author: Victor Cabrin
description: Vivid blue with a pale blue head, this is a striking cocktail. It also packs a whopping 45ml (1½oz) of blue curaçao but is far from being a "disco drink". It is a balanced colourful and vintage riff on the even older White Lady.
name: Blue Lady

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
